评论详情: I received these shoes and I tried them on immediately. I knew these are gonna be something I was gonna be purchasing over and again.. I have a neurodegenerative disorder and I like to have my feet barefoot most of the time in my home and then when I’m walking outside, I’ve noticed recently that any shoe that has a high platform on it. I struggle with even tennis shoes. So these shoes are perfect. I’ve walked in them all weekend and I’m in love.
they run very small, inner soles are crapy and must be replaced.
These shoes are super comfortable and high quality!
Estos son mi cuarto par de zapatos, son muy comodos y el precio para unos barefoot es bueno

I purchased another Xero model a couple years ago however this model Prio is the one I needed as I pursue more minimal running both outside and treadmill. If you are new to minimal I would suggest you study up so you are prepared for the adjustments needed. I will definitely buy another Prio.
Will buy again
Not original box
Love these shoes. Knee pain went away ever since I started using them. The are also stylish.
I love feeling the ground and nuances beneath my feet. When I take my shoes off at the end of the day, I love that it doesn't feel that much different from being barefoot! That's what amazes me most!

评论概述: Well Made But Are Wide and Large
评论详情: I wish I had returned these before I wore them outside. The toes are so wide that they are almost hard for me to walk in. They aren't very attarctive either.
Shoes provide very little support. Would not buy again

I really liked the look of these sneakers when ordering them.  They arrived and look just like the photo but the foot near toes are rounder than expected and are good for someone with a wider footI don’t find myself wearing them because of this.  My foot is not round it wide so when I look at them I don’t the the look as much as I thought I would
I am having plantar fasciitis issues and these were recommended. I’m not ready to wear them full-time yet transitioning.

评论概述: Disappointed - started to deteriorate after only a few months.
评论详情: Washed these on gentle with a soak after they got filthy - already falling apart at the closures. Eyeholes frayed, webbing frayed, foot bed peeled off. Won’t buy another pair. You should be able to wash your sneakers.

I had to return due to the sizing. I ordered my usual size, but they were too short. I recommend ordering 1/2 size up. Other than that, it looked like a nice shoe. But I can't comment on much else since I couldn't wear it.

I usually wear a 7 Wide sneaker or a 7.5 Wide sneaker. I ordered the Prio in a 7. I do have bunions and they do not rub against the rubberish material at the toes or inner sides, however after wearing them a week or two, my pinky toes have become squashed and red. They should be wider for people like me who take Wide. The length of the shoe is fine. The laces are great for adjusting width and comfort. These also have reflective stripes, and look cool for fashion. I will be wearing them with my orthodics on top of their insert (soles). Important to note they already have a small crack on the sole. But they did improve my posture while walking, on literally the first day, and my core muscles actually relaxed (stomache area) followed by my shoulders dropping down, instead of being tensed up. I also put thin Orthodics from my Dr, right over the foot bed, and they fit fine. If you have wide feet these are not for you, but probably excellent for normal width feet.

Maybe I should have ordered another size up, but out of the box these weren't as roomy as I expected them to be. Toe box isn't that spacious (or wearing barefoot shoes for a bit has caused an unusually large toe-spread). I'm a week in, and they've loosened up a bit and are more tolerable / comfortable. The laces are constantly coming undone, and honestly they feel better with super loose laces so I might replace those with something different.  Not worth the price, but I'd worn them around too much to return with the try before you buy option.
Doesn’t hurt my legs back or feet anymore

I have worn the sandals for years, and I needed a pair of sneakers.I wasn't sure about sizes...but I tried two sizes and these fit so well.  Toe room is awesome! The arch is comfy, I have room for my insoles if I want them(from a broken ankle).  The heels hold my heels without hurting my Achilles spurs.  I know that's a lot, but I am a challenge for shoes and these are so perfect from the get go!  100%

Be forewarned that these shows run wide all around, not just in the toe box.  Was looking for a shoe for weight lifting that had a flat sole and wide toe box to allow toes to spread.  Recommendation was to order normal size - these were way too short as my toes pressed into the end of the shoe.  Ended up one full size larger to get the appropriate length, but the shoe was sooo wide around the foot.  When I pulled it tight, the fabric wrinkled up everywhere causing uncomfortable pressure points.  If your foot is on the slimmer side of normal width or narrow width, these won't be for you.
Shoe actually fits well and looks great! Only thing I am disappointed about is the price is more than the Xero Company price!  I'll buy thru Xero next time!

评论概述: Not the same shoe it used to be
评论详情: I bought two pairs of these shoes in Nov 2021 and have been very happy with them. I recently bought two more pairs during Amazon Prime Days and am disappointed to find they are 17% heavier (I weighed old and new on my kitchen scale) and noticeably stiffer. They are also more snug in the length, which I don't like and another half size up would certainly be too big. I'm sending them back (one pair was the wrong size anyway). Probably still decent vs other options on the market but just not the same, unfortunately.

These are very cute. I love the barefoot shoe movement, love wider toe box. These in particular to size-I ordered 8.5, normal for me, it was huge, too long and wide. Then, tried 7.5 and they were wide enough but my toe was at the end, too short. Shoe sizing has been crazy. Not sure what to make of it. This shoe is very light weight, looks pretty well made. I don't like the laces, too much criscrossing, laces are too thick, somehow doesn't fit the barefoot idea. I would like them to be more fluid.

The barefoot feel of these shoes is comfortable, BUT they are not durable at all. I have ended up buying multiple pairs of these shoes within a relatively short time frame due to the sole wearing out. Regular shoes do not do this. People with wide feet also seem to love them. I have narrow feet, so the fit is kind of strange and requires double socks sometimes.

Love them!  Definitely size up though.  Mine are fine but wish I had gotten one size up since they do not have 1/2 sizes.  Super comfortable and cute. I will definitely be getting another pair.  I got the black/white but will soon be getting a colorful pair one size up.

评论概述: Way too expensive for what you get!
评论详情: These shoes were "ok" but not the price they should have been awesome!
Los compré para mis clases de CrossFit y están geniales, super suaves ligeros planos  y hermosos

The fit is excellent. 7.5 was true to size for me. I wore them at least 3 days while at a conference and I walked miles exploring the area. No pain in my feet. I like the reflective strap design. I would suggest wearing a sock that comes up higher than the shoe at the back of the ankle as it did rub bare skin and I could see that a blister could form in that spot. Even though the laces are kinda round, they stayed in my dbl knot and didn’t come undone while walking. Hope these last awhile as I'm pretty hard on my shoes.

评论概述: Shoes looked good but sizing was off
评论详情: Shoes were attractive and looked well made . I am always a size 8 . These were short so I compared the size in these shoes to my Topoathletic and my Allbirds. These were close to a 1/2 shorter than both of the others . The Topo and Allbirds were the same length . I was hoping to exchange for 8.5 but I bought them on a Prime  day deal and there is no option to exchange for same price . A bit sad because they were both attractive and well built .

Really liked how these look, but unfortunately had to return. I consistently wear a women's 9.5, and these were too short, and flared up my toenail that has a tendency toward ingrowing. Additionally, the two box was much narrower than I expected. It's possible that a size 10 would have fit length-wise, but they still would have been narrow in the toe box. If I buy from this brand in the future, I will have to try men's. Which doesn't seem fair; seems to me that both men's and women's should be equally roomy in the toe box. Women need wide toe box shoes too.

My second pair of Prios and I love them. Bought the first pair 4 years ago and now I have 7 pairs of  different Xero shoes and boots in my shoe rack. Love them. The old pair still looks brand new on top but guess I drag my feet a bit and the sole wore off. Totally recommend!!!

I was looking for a flat shoe to use for weight training. I have wide feet and I was happy to see they had a wide option. These have a flexible sole and I love that the sides cinch tighter as they are intertwined with the laces to provide better support. I was using running shoes for my weight training sessions and my regulat running shoes were just unstable. These fit snugly once tightened around the ankle and they do not compress my toes. I feel very stable in these shoes. I know I will have a better footing in these and I can use them for deadliest and squats without distorting my form. I already want to buy another pair for walking. I noticed I was standing upright better; unlike running shoes that cause me to lean forward. Definitely recommend them to anyone considering a minimal shoes. I probably will stick to my running shoes for running and better cushionint but these are my new favorite!

I love my Xero shoes, they fit so well and I can't stand wearing other shoes now that my feet know what a wide toe box is! Very flexible, great feel! It takes a little bit to get used to feeling the ground more, and once I did they were amazing. I own several different pairs now!

These shoes are so comfortable. Ample room in the toes. Great design. No pinches. Super cute. Could walk in the forever IF I was only walking on perfectly even ground in flawless weather conditions. If it’s wet or even remotely slippery. Hell, if you even just have wet shoe bottoms moving to even ground that was dry before you wet sole hit it you are going down. These are the slippery-est shoes I’ve ever worn in my life. Like rollerblades minus the wheels.
Big toe box is a plus.  The way the shoes position my body for lifting is really good
Love these shoes! They do run a half size small though. I bought 2 other shoes in the same brand and love those too!
I'm a group fitness instructor and I go through a lot of shoes. So far it took about 2-3 days to break these in. They were a little tight at first. The grip could be a little better.

I have bunions on outside of both my feet and ever since I converted have 0 bunion pain.  I wear a 9 usually but 10 in this was perfect. Also at first hard to get use to but push past that and give it time with barefoot shoes. Your legs and feet need time to adjust.

I am newly into a zero-drop shoe, the heel the same level as the ball of the foot. This is the second pair I’ve bought from Xero shoes. The first was a sandal, so I needed a closed toe for everything I wasn’t wearing the sandal to. I am sold on the design, to allow the foot to keep developing its muscles, and a wide toe bed to have a natural accommodation for the actual design of the foot. But these are not blob-ugly shoes. They look great; and I feel good about the way they are helping me keep my feet from worsening my bunions. I wore them a few hours at a time when first getting used to them, because they were developing muscles I hadn’t used for a while. Now I feel comfortable in them all day. For long hikes, I still keep the removable insole in; but for errands and normal stuff I take the insole out. I’m very impressed.
Got a pair of these for my wife and she loves them

评论概述: Returning my second pair of XERO shoes
评论详情: The shoes are too small. The shoe itself does not contain the foot as expected
Runs short in length, wide toe box.
Super comfy shoe for walking. Love the wide toe box and flat sole.

Love the wide toe box, washable in the machine, designed to wear without socks but I prefer them with. Love that you can feel texture through the sole for a real mind-body connection. I feel they have kept me from falling. I wear mine with Naboso textured insoles for even more brain stimulation.
Runs small, order half size up.

评论概述: Not Great for support or comfort.
评论详情: I really wanted to like these shoes, but the heel would constantly rub the back of my ankle causing it to bleed. This would happen anytime I wore these shoes loose or tight. Initially when I put them on they were very comfortable, but the issue with rubbing against my ankle was unbearable.

When I first got these I almost returned them as they look so wide but they're supposed to be, so although i didn't dig their appearance, I kept them.  Happy to say that Im glad I did! So comfortable that I always want to wear them and now I think they're super cute!!

I ordered and returned 15 different pairs of sneakers because I do over 10,000 steps a day at work and need extremely comfortable sneakers, especially as I’m nearing 40. Everything else SUCKED. I put these on and could not believe it. I don’t understand what they’re doing so differently, but I could never wear another sneaker in my entire life. I was grimacing at the price, but these are very high-quality materials. I get the price. I’ve seen similar enough styles and they do not feel like this. I’m glad shark tank saw something here. This brand needs to get so much bigger. Nothing is as comfortable as being barefoot and this is the closest you’re going to feel to barefoot. I don’t understand the secret, but I’ve never found another sneaker like this. I have worn them almost every single day at this point for over a year and they held their shape very well, so I’m going to average about a pair a year. I was going through 5-6 pairs a year prior
These are light and durable and let my feet feel the ground. I love them and will keep buying them.

Ive had a hard time finding comfortable shoes that do not cause me foot and hip pain. I was skeptical about these until i tried them. I wear them every where, walking, hiking, around the house and I have yet to have any discomfort. Highly recommend!
Shoe was too short.

I recently tried the XERO Women Prio Original shoes, as I have narrow feet and often opt for women's sizes due to the width of men's shoes. I wanted to share that I rated them 5 stars because of the fantastic 'Try Before You Buy' option, which I really appreciated. However, I found that this style of shoe is still too wide and not very comfortable for my feet. I tried both the 10.5 (equivalent to 8.5 in men's) and 11 (equivalent to 9 in men's), but encountered the same issue with both sizes. For nearly four years, I've been wearing Vivobarefoot shoes, which suit my feet perfectly. However, as styles change, I've been searching for the right shoe (FOR LESS) Vivobarefoot can be pricey and thought XERO might be a good fit. Unfortunately, they didn't work out for me. Thsnk so muhc XERO shoes.
Really wanted to like these, they're SO cute! However, even after ordering a 1/2 size up my toes were still brushing the end of the shoe, and the toe box wasn't quite wide enough.
They have brilliant features!  He are comfortable and I have plenty of toe room. .
Put these on out of the box, and my feet yelled YAY!!!  Lots of toe room.  Feel more comfortable without socks.  Make a squeek sound on tiles floors.  But they are PURPLE!

评论概述: I can actually feel my toes!
评论详情: Having had foot problems and weak ankles for years, I decided to try something different.  Someone recommended shoes with a bigger toe box (I didn't know anything like that ever existed) and tried several cheaper brands.  Do you know how wonderful it feels to feel your toes move in a shoe?  Liberating!  And the zero drop sole has allowed my poor hamstrings to loosen up - I can touch my toes again!  With weak ankles and weak arches, I've always been told I needed supportive shoes.  I now believe what I really needed all along was less support so that my foot muscles could get the exercise they need to stay strong and my toes could splay naturally to help with balance.  They are a little pricey for my budget, but I'm saving my money for another pair.  Love 'em so much!

评论概述: I will not buy another shoe
评论详情: I have been wearing Xero shoes for about 2 years now. Even when I try other shoes on at the store or think of wearing my old shoes I instantly change my mind. The freedom my feet feel and the durability is worth every penny. Every. Single. Time. Even my husband is wearing them. My next purchase is to buy some for my girls. Just buy them. I promise you will not regret it!
These shoes are great for indoor gym weight training- but not for walking or running. They feel like you are walking in your bare feet

My trainer got me into the zero drop shoes about 6 months ago. I'm writing this review after 6 months of use and I love them. I love the wide toe box and overall quality of the shoe. I still have more wear to put on them for sure. These have allowed me to preform better. Specifically with exercises that involve jumping. It's much more comfortable and no pain in my knees or shins when jumping.

评论概述: I received an used shoes. I returned it right away
评论详情: I received an used shoes. I returned it right away

but I was disappointed when I opened the box, the tissue paper was all wrinkled and evidence of being worn was noticed.  I know I chose this item to try before buying, but if I wanted to keep this item I would have wanted an unused pair of shoes.

评论用户: It was a nice sign & came quickly but it was NKT what I ordered! Even the invoice  was correct. I wanted a smooth Fox Terrier  but received a wire haired fix terrier.
评论概述: Needed Podiatry care after wearing these!
评论详情: I give these a ONE STAR. Yes! as advertised these shoes help your toes and foot to feel everything under them. I was so excited because of the wide toe box for my 9.5 size feet with my second toe being longer than my big toe. (a curse all my life in getting a good fitting shoe that didn't hurt) If you like barefoot on rocks then definitely go for Zero shoes. or...don't spend the money and just go barefoot all the time!  I damaged my one foot and needed some serious podiatrist care with exercises and a podiatry boot to wear! No...it wasn't a podiatrist scam. The Dr also recommended brands of shoes I could wear and told me to never go barefoot again even in the house. They said these shoes were the absolute worst thing for anyone's foot. To date (3 months later) I am pain free and wearing a good pair of New Balance Shoes. Does the seller scam you? can't say...maybe they are good for "someone" but not for me. And your podiatrist will say the same as mine did.

These were my second foray into minimal shoes. I like the look ok, and the fact that my toes can spread in the shoes. But, the inside sole of the shoe is made to be removed and I wish it would stay put. It will not stay put, no matter what I do, so you are just walking on the rubber sole part, which is too close to the ground and you can feel rocks, etc. which some people like in minimal shoes, but then why make a sole inside at all? Seems cheaply made for the price and how they actually work out.

I’m a fan of zero drop shoes. As such, I know the hallmarks of this type of design are minimal support, a feel for the walking surface, and a wide toe box. People who criticize these features don’t understand the point of the shoes. For me, these Xeros are fantastic. I bought my normal size—9.5. I could have fit into a 9, but these have room everywhere. Room for socks, room to relax my arthritic feet, room to walk at my normal gait. You don’t know how rare all that room is in a shoe, without being too big in any way. The lacing system enables me to tighten the mid-foot if I want an bit more support. These Prios are so cute as well. Can you tell I love them? Try them with an open mind, and I think you will too.
This shoe runs small. Although I changed it for a bigger size, my toes touch and scratches the front and top. I thought these shoes were a little bit higher and wider. Should reevaluate this.

评论概述: Adorable, reminds me of shoes I had when I was a kid in the 70s
评论详情: Wide toe box provides a comfortable fit.  True to size.  Xero shoes have little cushioning or arch support.  I'm very pleased with the quality.  I think they will hold up over time.
I just opened the box and the runner at the top of shoe is almost completely off!!

评论概述: The soles are very slick on gravel and loose dirt
评论详情: The soles seem plastic-like rather than rubber and are very slick.  I would not recommend.

评论概述: Oh how I wish these worked!
评论详情: These shoes are described as something to allow your feet to do their jobs. I’m totally on board with less support and allowing my toes free movement to grip the ground as I stand and walk and move around. I can see that for someone with a wider foot, these shoes would be absolutely perfect. My foot is on the narrower side, and I couldn’t even lace them up, tight enough to keep them from coming off. The shoes are really cute, and I wish they were a bit narrower. Or maybe if my feet were wider, I could’ve enjoyed them. Either way I completely would recommend these shoes, but only if your feet are on the wider side.

评论概述: No hurting feet after 2 full days in Orlando parks
评论详情: All I have to say is that these sneakers are my favorite pair!  After 2 full days at the Orlando theme parks, and walking 7-8 miles a day, standing in lines, my feet don’t have any fatigue.  My knees which always hurt, have very minimal fatigue.  These for sure will be my go to sneakers for now on.  I couldn’t be happier.

I got these as a recommended Taiji shoe.  They have a nice wide toe bed that allow your toes to spread out.  I have extra wide feet, so I ordered a half size up.  They are very comfortable when I first them on .I really like how small they look compared to my same size. Hokas.  Not as much cush as the Hokas, of course, but feel more balanced in them then the Hokas.  Note; If your not used to minimal shoes, I suggest you get used to them by wearing them for a a mile, and increasing the wear time.

I haven't worked out in these yet, but walking around they are very comfortable. Losts of room in the toe box. Apparently I'm supposed to slowly adjust to the barefoot style before running in them. So far so good.
I walk a lot and these shoes have been great on the trail and around the neighborhood...feet have plenty of room and flexibility
Despite having a wider toe box than most, they're still too narrow for my teen. Had to send back.
Takes awhile to get used to the lack of support but being a barefoot person, they work well for me.

评论概述: Make sure to get the 1/2 size large
评论详情: They are very comfortable they feel like a globe. The only issue I had is they felt too tight.  My toes touched the front wall in an uncomfortable way.  It is not  some this you could wait and adjust to it.  You definitely need to get a 1/2 size larger.  I am size 8.  I got  8.5 and it fit perfec.
I didn’t like theses at all! Very uncomfortable
I love the flat sole, but they are giving me blisters!!! I can’t return them because the bottoms are dirty from wearing them around.
The material is rigid, will take a while to break in. Flat soles (as expected) little heel or ankle support. I wear these for basic walking around. the quality is good so far

I loved them.  Then I tripped and realized the sole had come away from the shoe!  I bought the shoes in June and by September they had come apart.  Im not a big person at 5'7" and 123lbs.  Just very poorly made.  I am so disappointed

I bought these for work. I had read multiple reviews about barefoot shoes from people working in occupation that require you to walk and stand frequently before I committed to this purchase. I also bought cheaper barefoot shoes to work out in. I like my cheaper shoes, BUT the Xero shoes were a great purchase for work. They do take some getting used to. But I don’t have the constant aches after work. There is no cushioning. So you will definitely feel the floor under you. But my balance feels better and I honestly feel this is a better shoe for me. For running on the treadmill, I bought a Dr. School’s insole to use until my running form improves.  Overall, I like the shoes and don’t see myself going back to heavily cushioned shoes again.
These are the best choice I have for shoes for working in a hospital, I wear them with toes spacer for the big toe and it really helped with my bunion pain after long shifts
These shoes are soft, flexible, and yet still provide plenty of support. As they are super cute and comfy. They do run slightly big.

I purchased these based on reviews of these being good for weight lifting. My feet are happy. I use these for my kettlebell and total body strength workouts. The toe box is awesome. I can wiggle my toes and still feel planted for my weighted moves. Side to side movements are well supported due to the leather portion of the shoe. I’m normally a size 7 but sized up to 7.5. Perfect fit. Breathable and comfortable. I and my feet are happy.
Feels like my heels are tipped down, never experienced a fit like this. The backs are also low and it is hard to put the shoes on. Not comfortable, not a fan, would not recommend.

I really wanted to like these shoes.  The width of the toe box was fine and didn't squish my toes, but midfoot and around the ankle, the shoe was just too bulky for my liking.  I decided it was not something I could get used to, so I returned these and will keep searching.

评论概述: These look bulky and the liner on the bottom won’t stay in place
评论详情: I wanted to like these shoes.. but they are so bulky.. they look silly with most of my outfits.. also the first time I wore them the bottom liner kept slipping back and up my Achilles.. I had to remove the liners all together.. I am a runner.. I do not wear these because they don’t hug my feet like they should.
These are perfect for wide feet in the front.

Was really excited for this pair of shoes but the color scheme is not what was displayed in the pictures or even the box. Why can’t women get to choose the iconic red and blue as well? I guess purple and blue is close enough haha. The removable insoles are nice for getting used to going zero-drop, but could be better quality. But overall imo worth the price for a comfortable beginner barefoot shoe. Happy walking friends and be sure to stay safe!

I finally found a minimalist shoe that looks great and feels great. I will only buy xero shoes from now on. I immediately bought 2 more pairs after getting these and look forward to buying more. Highly recommend

评论概述: Most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn
评论详情: I have very wide feet from having gone barefoot much of my childhood. It’s really hard for me to find shoes that don’t leave my feet in pain after wearing them for a long period. These shoes are different from your typical wide width shoe. The toe box on these shoes is much wider than most wide width shoes. Some reviews said these shoes take awhile to get used to because they are minimalist shoes without much support. It didn’t take me any time to adjust to these shoes. They felt comfortable immediately, but perhaps that is from already being used to going barefoot. I normally where an 8.5-9 and I did go up to a 9.5 in these shoes for the proper fit.
Bummed.. shoe came in and it had scuff marks on the side, the bottom seemed worn too… 95 $ and I get a used pair of shoes.. 😳..
These are amazing shoes, if you like to go barefoot. No arch these are flat bottoms. I love my shoes!

So far so good. These are my first zero drop shoes and I’m breaking my feet in slowly as I’ve read is helpful online. So far super happy with the fit and feel. My toes are enjoying the wide open spaces and my arch hasn’t protested the lack of internal support. I’ll give them a good test next week at a weeklong conference where there’s A LOT of walking between buildings on a college campus. Super excited about the lightweight pack-ability potential!

I wear a women’s 8 in Nike, New Balance, and On Cloud so I ordered an 8 in these. I definitely should have ordered a half size smaller if not a whole size down.  The shoe is almost like a rectangle because the shoe is as wide in front as it is in the back- which is probably the whole point of this shoe. Also, I’m 5’3” and do not have to wear petite pants because my shoes usually have a thick sole on them and these have no sole whatsoever so now my pants are kinda long.  It’s really like being barefoot.  It may take me a while to get used to them. I’m going to trade them in for a 7 1/2 but overall I like them.
Shoes are very comfortable.  I bought my usual size and the fit is perfect
These made my ankles look chunky and my toes were rubbing a bit on the front even when I sized up. I’m a 8.5M in most shoes, sometimes 9. Neither size was comfortable enough to keep.
I don’t like wearing shoes but these make is comfortable for when I have to be on the move :)

These shoes are very comfortable with a nice wide toe box. I like the heel strap which gives me zero heel slip. I returned these because I was able to get the same ones on sale directly from Xero for about half price. For $50ish, I really like them but I do think they're overpriced at $80+.

Needed zero drop shoes for every day, helps alleviate nerve pain in left foot, and with right foot knee and hip pain/injury. These are great for  walking, stationary bike, treadmill, rowing machine, grocery shopping, house cleaning, chasing grandkids, walking sidewalks or in grass. Just all the time!
